headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://www.googletagmanager.com https://www.google-analytics.com; connect-src 'self' https://www.google-analytics.com https://analytics.google.com https://vitals.vercel-insights.com; img-src 'self' data: https://www.google-analytics.com; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; font-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none';
